content:
RagMetrics is a platform designed to evaluate and optimize Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems and Large Language Models (LLMs). It offers features such as automated evaluation loops, custom performance metrics, A/B testing frameworks, and retrieval optimization. These tools are intended to help developers measure and enhance the performance of their AI applications. citeturn0search0

The platform provides various pricing plans to accommodate different needs, starting from a 'Start up' plan at $750 per month, which includes synthetic data generation, evaluation of all AI models, three custom metrics, dashboards, A/B testing, experiments, access for three users, and 500 LLM judgments per month. citeturn0search3

RagMetrics aims to assist LLM application builders in proving return on investment by setting up scalable evaluations, which can be beneficial for acquiring new customers, raising capital, and making informed decisions about model and prompt selection. citeturn0search5

For a more in-depth understanding of RagMetrics' capabilities, you might find the following demo video helpful:

videoRAGmetrics Demoturn0search7
